Application Web Server (Real-Time, Windows)

Parent Topic: Overview: Web-based Communication with a LabVIEW Application (Real-Time, Windows)

You can use either NI Web Server or Application Web Server to host your Web services. Topics under this book are Application Web Server specific.

Note��For more information about concepts in this topic, refer to the Web services introduction and tutorial. LabVIEW Web services are available only in the LabVIEW Full Development System and the LabVIEW Professional Development System.
